item.title: DJLR Trance Suggestions [WIP]
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Alright so - I really like it. I do agree the progression should be 8 measures. Itâ€™s going well so far, but if you want to change the drop I have 2 suggestions - you could keep it the way it is and add a lead, or do a slight break from the trance style and do a hard drop or a breakbeat drop. By no means am I suggesting you do what I did with it, Iâ€™m just putting this here in case it might inspire you. I just played around with some random stuff, it isnâ€™t that great (or sequenced well, itâ€™s just a bunch of ideas slapped together).
